Name: Solarwinds - Unmanage
Description: Stop monitoring for a Solarwinds node, application or both

Parameters.Name: Host
Parameters.Label: Host
Parameters.HelpText: IP or DNS of the Solarwinds monitoring server

Parameters.Name: NodeId
Parameters.Label: Node ID
Parameters.HelpText: Solarwinds ID of machine to be unmonitored. Starts with 'N:'.

Parameters.Name: ApplicationId
Parameters.Label: Application ID
Parameters.HelpText: Solarwinds ID of application to be unmonitored. Starts with 'AA:'.

Parameters.Name: RemanageMinutes
Parameters.Label: Re-manage after (minutes)
Parameters.HelpText: Automatically begins monitoring of a node after given minutes.

Parameters.Name: Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: Username for the Solarwinds console user.

Parameters.Name: Password
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: Password for the Solarwinds console user
